Title: 15 Minutes With
Tagline: Meet Laetitia, founder of the Fashion brand LEÏ 1984
ChatText: We shared a cup of coffee in Paris with Laetitia
IntroText: In between two trips from the South of France and Paris, Laetitia Guerini, founder of the Fashion brand LEÏ 1984, found a few minutes to share a coffee and to tell us more about her work, inspirations & parisian daily life…

LeftQuestion.question: Your latest discovery?
LeftQuestion.answer: Raw cocoa, homemade granola, and Rosefield.

LeftQuestion.question: Your morning ritual?
LeftQuestion.answer: A part of my new beauty ritual is to wash my face with a Konjak sponge. It’s a new concept from Japan, 100% natural. All you have to do is to add water and it takes off all your make-up. It’s magic!

LeftQuestion.question: For you, life in France is…
LeftQuestion.answer: Fast-paced when in Paris, but more relax when I’m home in Aix. I share most of my time between those two cities: I take advantage of the calm & peacefulness of Aix to charge my battery and design my new collections. However once I get to Paris the rhythm gets more intense: I go from one meeting to the other… It can be pretty insane !

RightQuestion.question: Morning or evening?
RightQuestion.answer: Easy question, and without hesitation: evening! It’s as if I store my energy throughout the day so that I can use it all at night.

QuoteText: It’s as if I store my energy throughout the day so that I can use it all at night.
Name: Laetitia

CenterQuestion.question: with a free hour during the day, i…
CenterQuestion.answer: It’s quite rare, but if it happens I immediately seize the occasion to go to a yoga class! I’m trying to take care of myself, and for this purpose, I still haven’t found something more effective than Yoga.

LeftQuestion.question: A nice memory?
LeftQuestion.answer: Last summer, taking naps on the banks of a wild lake.

RightQuestion.question: I am always late / on time:
RightQuestion.answer: I’m always running to be on time, but I’m always super stressed to be late.

RightQuestion.question: If you could teleport yourself anywhere:
RightQuestion.answer: In Corsica, to visit my dad… I didn’t have time to actually go last summer.

WatchSection.WatchText: The Mercer Rosegold, it’s a real statement piece of jewelry!

LeftQuestion.question: What people don’t know about me:
LeftQuestion.answer: Even though I do my best to hide it, I am always scared when it comes to selling my designs.

LeftQuestion.question: In five years I…
LeftQuestion.answer: I hope I’ll be lucky enough to still be doing what I love.

LeftQuestion.question: The one thing that you always say:
You would love to spend an hour with:

RightQuestion.question: The song that you can’t stop listening to?
The last movie that made you cry?
An amazing 15 minute recipe?
RightQuestion.answer: Homemade Pistou sauce! Easy and delicious!

RightQuestion.question: A little habit of yours?
RightQuestion.answer: Mandatory evening ritual : a Yogi Tea infusion.

MainCloseImageText.QuoteText: In five years, I hope I’ll be lucky enough to still be doing what I love.
